sentences.sentence: "Everything depends on Carlos," Mancini said, "If he apologises to the squad and to me, then everything will be as before."
sentences.translation: “一切取决于卡洛斯，”曼奇尼说：“如果他向队伍和我道歉，那么一切事情都将像以前一样。”

sentences.sentence: He apologises, asks if the seat beside her is taken and then appears to engage her in polite conversation.
sentences.translation: 他道了歉，问她旁边的座位是否有人，然后似乎和她开始礼貌地对话。
